recommendations: Chris Cook ‚ÄúShivi has an exceptional talent in managing social media and personal branding. I have the daily pleasure of working alongside Shivi and she never fails to not only be a absolute delight to work with, but also I've consistently been impressed by her dedication, creativity, and unwavering commitment to want to execute the task better each time. From the moment Shivi and I started working together, it became evident that she possessed a rare combination of being able to envision the route to achieve success and the hands-on expertise in making the ever-evolving landscape of social media work for me. Her ability to craft compelling content tailored to my target audience has been instrumental in expanding my online presence and driving meaningful engagement. What truly sets Shivi apart, however, is her genuine personality and her desire for helping people to elevate their personal brands. She approaches each project with enthusiasm and care, taking the time to understand the goals and aspirations of those she works with. Whether it's providing invaluable insights, offering constructive feedback, or going above and beyond to ensure success, Shivi consistently goes the extra mile to support others in their journey towards building a strong and authentic personal brand. Beyond her professional expertise, Shivi is also an incredible team player and a joy to collaborate with. Her positive attitude, strong work ethic, and willingness make her an invaluable asset to any team or organisation. Thank you Shivi‚Äù

Rosalyn Palmer Clinical Hyp. ARTT ‚ÄúShivi is a joy to work with. She is knowledgeable, creative and hard working.She is organised and plans strategically and really listens and as a client she makes you feel absolutely in safe hands. Her writing and perception are second to none and I would recommend her without hesitation.‚Äù
